sentences.en: As a junior, he shouldn't speak so disrespectfully.
sentences.cn: 作为晚辈, 他出言如此不恭真是不应该.

sentences.en: Be sure not to treat the guests disrespectfully.
He treats his parents rather disrespectfully.
sentences.cn: 他对自己的父母非常无礼.

sentences.en: It and down disrespectfully, mocking hunting soldiers. It threw a nut at them.
sentences.cn: 它无礼地上窜下跳, 戏弄士兵们, 还朝他们扔果核.

sentences.en: It jumped up and down disrespectfully, mocking the hunting soldiers. It threw a nut at them.
sentences.cn: 他无礼地上下跳来跳去, 戏弄士兵们, 还朝他们扔果核.

sentences.en: They get angry if they think they are being treated disrespectfully.
sentences.cn: 他们要是觉得受到了怠慢，就会大动肝火。

sentences.en: What I have done to make you treat me so disrespectfully?
sentences.cn: 我到底做了什么让你这么不尊重我?

words.tran_cn: 无礼的；失礼的；不尊敬的
